<title level="1" right="Rules">[Craft Requirements](/Rules.aspx?ID=3156)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 223 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
An item might require the crafter to provide specific raw materials, supply spells, or meet other special requirements to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385) it. These appear in the Craft Requirements entry of the stat block. Any of these Craft Requirements are in addition to the normal requirements for crafting the item.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
